name: Bonfire at Earl Bales Park
location: Firepit beside the parking lot at Earl Bales Park, please use the dropped pin below for the exact location. Entering in Earl Bales Park on google maps will bring you to a different point in the park. The nearest bus stop is at Bathurst and Sheppard and it's about a 10 minute walk. Parking is free!
whatToBring: Warm jacket and personal snacks. It's looking like it will be ~18 degrees.
whenYouArrive: Give Maseh a call at 647-561-4010 if you need support.
additionalDetails: The nearest bus stop is at Heron and Riverside and it's about a 5 minute walk. Parking is $1 per half hour.
cancellation: If you are unable to attend, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If we need to cancel the event, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and refunded.

name: Bonfire at Earl Bales Park
description: Come for deep talks and chill by the fire!
location: Earl Bales Park in North York
whenYouArrive: Give Maseh a call at 647-561-4010 if you need support.
additionalDetails: Firepit beside the parking lot at Earl Bales Park (see https://maps.app.goo.gl/4UxBnykYcxjX4be16). Entering in Earl Bales Park on google maps will bring you to a different point in the park. The nearest bus stop is at Bathurst and Sheppard and it's about a 10 minute walk. Parking is free!
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and fully refunded.

name: Picnic at Vincent Massey
whatToBring: Summer attire and a dish for yourself (and to share if you're comfortable!)
whenYouArrive: Give Maseh a call at 647-561-4010 and I'll give you directions to our picnic spot.
additionalDetails: The nearest bus stop is at Heron and Riverside and it's about a 5 minute walk. Parking is $1 per half hour.
cancellation: If you are unable to attend, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If there is light rain in the forecast, we'll go ahead as planned in one of the park's two covered picnic shelters. If we need to cancel the event, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and refunded.

name: Board Game Night at Snakes & Lattes
description: You're invited to a board game night at Snakes and Lattes! What better way to make friends for a good time, not a long time than a competitive game of UNO? Board game aficionados and noobs welcome!
whenYouArrive: If you're having trouble spotting us, give Maseh a call at 647-561-4010 and he will walk you over.
additionalDetails: The reservation covers Snakes and Lattes' entry fee. Food and beverages are optional and not included in the reservation fee. Accessibility details are available at https://www.snakesandlattes.com/location/midtown/. There is street parking nearby, as well as Green P parking for $6.00 (details can be found at https://parking.greenp.com/carpark/29_75-holly-street/). The nearest subway station is Eglinton.
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and fully refunded.

name: Magik Mike’s FIRST Viewer Meetup – (Toronto, Canada)
description: For the first time ever, I’m hosting a local meetup for viewers of my channel! Come hang out, listen to music, and make new friends!
location: Orchard Pavillion, 70 Canuck Ave, North York, ON M3K 2C5 (Downsview Park)
whatToBring: Sweater / Jacket, Towel or Blanket to sit on (we’ll be on the grass)
whenYouArrive: Give me a call if you need support. I will arrive early to setup and post coordinates of my exact location once I arrive so you know exactly where to go within the park.
additionalDetails: Downsview Park has free parking and is a 10-minute walk from Downsview Station. The $5 fee is to ensure people are committed to the event and will go towards a few snacks and drinks (and nametags) for everyone. I will also be bringing a Bluetooth speaker for everyone to make song requests for us to listen to, a deck of cards, hand sanitizer, and a Frisbee in case anyone is down! If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to text or email me!
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and fully refunded.
